title: Clinical Trial
description: Encapsulates information regarding a clinical trial.

protocol_identifier.description: Trial identifier used by lead organization, ie. Center for Experimental Therapeutics Program (CTEP) ID or Industry Sponsored ID.  This is usually a short identifier. Example: E4412.

trial_description.description: A brief description of the clinical trial.

trial_organization.description: Name of the primary organization that oversees the clinical trial. Example: ECOG-ACRIN, SWOG, etc.

grant_or_affiliated_network.description: The primary organization providing grant funding and supporting the trial.

trial_status.description: What stage the clinical trial is at in its process.

biobank.description: The primary organization responsible for storing biospecimens from this study.

lead_cimac_pis.description: The PI(s) from the CIMAC-CIDC network responsible for this study.

lead_cimac_contacts.description: A list of contacts for this trial.

lead_trial_staff.description: The names of lead trial staff members other than the PIs.

justification.description: A description of the reasons why this study could provide insight into molecular biomarkers of immunotherapy.

biomarker_plan.description: A description of the objectives and hypotheses for the proposed biomarkers.

data_sharing_plan.description: A description of the rules governing data sharing and publications.

collection_event_list.description: A list associating collection events with allowed sample types.

allowed_collection_event_names.description: Allowed values for sample.json#properties/collection_event_name for this trial.

allowed_cohort_names.description: Allowed values for sample.json#properties/cohort_name for this trial.

participants.description: The collection of all data related to a specific participant in the context of a specific clinical trial.
